official_title: A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, to limit the liability for negligence of United States registered pilots navigating vessels on the Great Lakes so as to provide for reciprocal and equitable participation by United States and Canadian citizens in the pilotage of vessels on the Great Lakes.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to Great Lakes pilotage to limit to $1,000 the liability imposed upon a U.S. registered pilot (and certain associations) for injuries or losses resulting from any incident caused by pilot negligence in directing the navigation of any vessel in the waters of the Great Lakes.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, to limit the liability for negligence of United States registered pilots navigating vessels on the Great Lakes so as to provide for reciprocal and equitable participation by United States and Canadian citizens in the pilotage of vessels on the Great Lakes.
